message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's try a bit more fairness, 55 for me seems reasonable considering the inflation ahead.
The inflation will only get worse Bob. Take this offer while it's still good.
Inflation is biting, I need a bit more to make up for it. This is my best offer yet.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair deal, especially with the inflation getting out of hand!
